Mr. Watson said word of Mr. Andy Coulson 's resignation had been "sneaked out" on a busy news day when former Tony Blair was testifying before an inquiry into the Iraq war. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth, Mr. Watson said. For the Labour Party, Mr. Andy Coulson 's departure partly overshadowed its own woes over the departure of Mr. Johnson, a veteran Labour official and former government minister. We just did everything right at the end. I think Chris Webber did a great job at the end. We ran the offense through him and he made some great things happen. Chris Webber and Allen Iverson combined for 50 of the Sixers' 84 shots and made 25 of the 42 field goals. While Allen Iverson scored 24 points in the first half, Chris Webber followed with 15 in the second. "
